lead_paragraph: For the past 26 years, Dave Meltzer’s homemade publication, The Wrestling Observer, has pulled back the curtain on a notoriously secretive business.
snippet: For the past 26 years, Dave Meltzer’s homemade publication, The Wrestling Observer, has pulled back the curtain on a notoriously secretive business.
